person.persName: Silas E. Duckworth (2nd Lieutenant, 37th KY Infantry and Larue County farmer)

body.p: Residence: Larue County, KY. A Kentucky-born farmer. During the Civil War, second lieutenant of the Rock Creek (KY) Home Guards and second lieutenant of Company I, 37th Kentucky Infantry.
